update.body: Throughout the book I've noticed how all of Jay's girlfriends have had a negative impact on his life. There was Debbie, who seemed like a nice girl at first and then got him into drugs. Then there was Tina, the girlfriend who got him into the O. I have a feeling that Jay's gonna find himself another girlfriend that will do the same to him. She will probably get him into some pretty bad stuff.

update.action_text: okay so this weekend i decided i would make stars in a jar. so i was really excited right. well i bought the expensive paint(martha stewart ...
update.body: okay so this weekend i decided i would make stars in a jar. so i was really excited right. well i bought the expensive paint(martha stewart brand) and decided i was gonna splatter paint mine so in order for the paint the splatter, i added a little water. well the paint is water based so adding more water made the "glow" dull. you can only imagine how pissed i am! DAMN YOU MARTHA STEWART!
